授業の概要・背景: In this class, students will read and watch videos on world topics and events and practice expressing their ideas by writing and speaking in English. In particular, the following points will be focused: 1) improving English pronunciation through shadowing, 2) improving listening and reading skills, 3) expressing their thoughts and opinions in the form of writing and speaking. Students will also give mini-presentations based on the topics they choose.
授業方法:
The class is conducted in a face-to-face format including simultaneous and two-way sessions. In this course, you will do several input and output activities either in a pair or group by using the textbook and do the assignments on LUNA after the lecture and submit the assignment by the deadline. You will follow several steps (reading the passage, watching the video, writing your opinions and practicing giving a mini-speech) so that you will be better prepared for the mini-presentation in each unit. You will do both individual and group works to prepare for your mini-presentation for each unit. On the final day, you will give a longer presentation to show your improvement from the daily practices. 
＊For questions, you can use KG Email or LUNA.
